column3: â€œJust got this today and am Paxing it as I write. The flavor is great. Very fruity and smooth on the inhale/exhale. It seems to be a perfect hybrid. Normally I like heavy couch lock indicas but I am enjoying it's upbeat yet sedative effect. Nausea, stomach issues have been eased away by this comforting strain. Good for outdoors as well.â€

Feel the affects within 3 hits;)â€
â€œI thought I liked ak47 too much to go for blueberry ak, but I found this was perfect for focus while remaining relaxed. no anxiety. will get again in the future.â€

â€œPotent but up lifting body buzz, same goes for head. Instant feeling followed by a back up creeper wave" that can be fairly lethargic in heavy doses. Though it's an excellent on-the-go day time strain.â€"

â€œThis strain is ace, knocked me straight on my ass. It has quickly become one of my favorites because of its ability to get me zooted every time. â€œThis is my first time smoking weed, so my review might be a little off. This hybrid is relatively sedative, smoked about 0.4 gram and fell asleep about 40 mins after smoking it. Woke up feeling nauseous and groggy for the first 3 -5 hrs, drastically improve my sleep quality though. 

All in all, a good sleeping aid!â€

â€œVery versatile strain. Well balanced. Can easily be used for an energetic day time high, or as a relaxing nightcap. If you smoke enough, you might get a little couch lock. Had me laughing quite a bit, just put me in an overall happy mood.â€

â€œI love this strain, first I ever had and I still do it now. The taste is great, the smell is nice (although when trying to hide it from roommates it is a bit of a strong smell.) The high for me isnâ€™t always amazing but the dreams I get from it is like heaven.â€
